inscription:
Inscription

verso, LLC, in pencil: [Casolani. Alessandro]
medium: Black chalk (recto), pen and brown ink over red chalk (verso) on laid paper
provenance: [Herbert E. Feist, New York, until 1973; sold for $125 to Moir]; Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (1973-d. 2010; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Twisting Nude (recto); Two Figures in a Boat with Landscape (verso)
